text: ta znav tykh, yaki lytsemiryatʹ! Yim skazaly: «Pryyditʹ ta stanʹte do borotʹby na shlyakhu Allaha abo khocha b zakhyshchaytesʹ!» Vony vidpovily: «Yakby zh my znaly, shcho vidbudetʹsya biy, to neodminno pishly b za vamy!» Ale u tsey denʹ vony buly blyzhchi do nevirʺya, nizh do viry. Vony hovoryatʹ svoyimy vustamy te, choho nemaye u yikhnikh sertsyakh. Allah znaye pro te, shcho vony prykhovuyutʹ
